name: Sabotage Construct
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: People of the River © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as confusion, except that it affects only constructs. When you are rolling for a confused construct's behavior, a result of 26–50 indicates the construct twitches spasmodically. On a successful Will save, the construct is confused for only 1 round.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则部分生效
text_zh: 此法术如同困惑术(functions)般作用，除了它只影响构装体。当你在骰困惑的构装体的行为时，26-50的结果是构装体间歇性抽蓄。意志豁免成功的话，该构装体只会困惑1轮。
